column4: I just learned a philosphy...If i stay on this chat room for long enough will I become a Ubuntu guru?
if you keep trying things out in ubuntu you will
no mouse?
no mouse?
you are learning in hardcore :)
not even ncurses then?
uhm well do you know the terminal program screen?
you didn't answer, but you can copy-paste in termanal by using "screen"... if you start screen and then sign on to irc from that command-line
using screen you can jump from different terminals without using any x
just write screen in commandline...then probably you have to press enter, and then sign on to irc from there, and come back here and i will tell you
what did not work?
it will not change your graphics, it will give you the possibility to copy-paste without graphics, and also you don't have to quit irc to try stuff
but you have to understand what you are supposed to do first
no, also you will be able to come back to the chat and see old messages
no
how do you start your irc client?

what you need to do is to start your irc client after you have started screen. To do that you have to do this, and read very carefully: after you exit here, type "screen" and press enter. After that, read the message if you get one and press enter. Then from there, type "epic5 -a irc.freenode.net"
if you came back here then maybe it did work
how can you say it didnt work when you dont know what will happen
yes but when you are inside screen you can do stuff
now you can open another terminal... you have to do two things: 1) press ctrl+a and then c (a new terminal will open) 2) press ctrl+a twice (you will come back here)
